PORTS.title: PORTS
PORTS.description: Masscan ports argument, can use commas and hyphens, e.g. '80-82,433' or '53,80,433' (default).

MAX_RATE.title: MAX_RATE
MAX_RATE.description: Masscan scan rate, defaults to 100. A high rate will result in faster scans, but can DoS your own network connection or that of your target. Please check https://github.com/robertdavidgraham/masscan#transmit-rate-important before modification.
